titles.title: Wi li li li li li ee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wi li li li li ee
Alleluia haya

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Honour the Word of God
praise the Word of God (x2)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 1) This is the Word of God– Alleluia haya

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The message of love– Alleluia haya
Acclaim the Word of God

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
2) This is the Word of God –
Alleluia hayaThe message of peace

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
– Alleluia haya
Acclaim the Word of God

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
3) This is the Word of God –
Alleluia hayaThe message of joy–

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Alleluia haya
Acclaim the Word of God
